message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can shake hands!
Your turn was too generous, now it's time for me to take a bigger share!
You took a big share last round, now it's my turn to try to balance it out!
I'm not afraid of a little risk, let's see how you feel about this offer!
You're taking a bigger share each round, I'll try to catch up!
I'm not backing down, let's see if you'll make a move!
I'm not giving up yet! Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! Let's take it all!
I'm not giving up yet, but I'm getting close to the edge!
You're running out of time, it's almost all mine!
I'm making a final push, let's see if you'll meet me halfway!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
